reporting-org.narrative: Arab Foundation for Freedoms and Equality

title.narrative: 1.3.2 Social Change Programme on strategic planning and production of media tools (to support VAW work)

description.narrative: 1.3.2 Social Change Program on strategic planning and production of media tools (to support VAW work)

activity-date.narrative: Activists learn during this module how to use media for activism on the issues of gender and sexuality and VAW. They also learn how to hold a critical analysis of the media. They will also learn how to produce media for activism and how to use the social media to promote their work and campaigns.

Activists learn during this module how to use media for activism on the issues of gender and sexuality and VAW. They also learn how to hold a critical analysis of the media. They will also learn how to produce media for activism and how to use the social media to promote their work and campaigns.

organisation.narrative: The Arab Foundation for Freedoms and Equality

receiver-org.narrative: The Arab Foundation for Freedoms and Equality

title.narrative: Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Framework
O.1. Strengthened voices and more connected communities of ALL women so that they can challenge norms, values and power structures and push back against violence against them.
Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Framework
O.1.1 Number of activists that improved their capabilities in campaigning, public education and awareness raising on VAW and implementing programmes to address VAW developed by implementing partners
O1.2 Number of strategies /action plans developed to respond to violence
1.1 Organisations and activists have improved capabilities in campaigning, public education and awareness raising on VAW and implementing programmes to address VAW inclusively
Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Framework

1.1.2 Number of activists that improved their capabilities in campaigning, public education and awareness raising on VAW and implementing programmes to address VAW developed directly by consortium partners. Capabilities to be further detailed by consortium partners, e.g. activists use new strategies/ change strategies/methodologies, or use new groups/orgs, tools, other.

1.1.2 Number of activists that improved their capabilities in campaigning, public education and awareness raising on VAW and implementing program to address VAW developed directly by consortium partners. Capabilities to be further detailed by consortium partners, e.g. activists use new strategies/ change strategies/methodologies, or use new groups/orgs, tools, other.
1.2 Increased capabilities of women and girls to demand their rights and respond to violence.

1.2.1 Number of women and girls that have increased capability to demand their rights and respond to violence.

comment.narrative: AFE is currently re-planning all activities originally planned to take place in the first two quarters of 2020 as COVID-19 measures halted all activities. Once setting all the plans, AFE will discuss it with the consortium and the Dutch ministry for any change.

comment.narrative: AFE pushed this activity to Q3 to better study all possible alternatives or means to carry out this activity. AFE will communicate with the activists, the consortium and Dutch ministry if any changes will be applied.

comment.narrative: Due to COVID-19 measures, the implementation of such initiatives was halted. We are waiting for the measures to be lifted in order to proceed. Other wise we are re-planning in case we need to move to different activities.
